name: Big Bear Sniper 2017
description:
You are a hunter who shoot and kill bears. You can see around and aim from your sniper gun to shoot the bear. If your fire is missed, the bears will come toward you and you can become his prey

FEATURES:
* 3D graphics and environments.
* Free moving ability.
* No connectivity required while playing.
* Addictive, loving & fun.
* Multi-touch enabled.
